Tag_Youmay.description: the timed side quest | [[Goddess of the Hunt]], a quest on Mykonos

MemoryInfobox.name: Goddess of the Hunt
MemoryInfobox.description: 'A local hunter felt a curse had fallen on the land. She wanted to dedicate hunts of predators and goats to Artemis to cleanse the curse.'

General_Description: '''Goddess of the Hunt''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A huntress called for help in order to appease the goddess [[Artemis]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''Need to appease Artemis to restore the animals and break the curse. Come see me for details on how you can help.'' She sought out the huntress and addressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You left a note on the board. What's going on?'' *'''Woman:''' ''I've made sacrifices to Artemis, goddess of the hunt, but ever since the leader died, the whole area seems cursed. I need to purify it.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''How are you planning to do it?'' *'''Woman:''' ''Artemis loves the hunt like I do - there are many [[goat]]s and predators in this area. I think blood from the hunted will please her.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to spill the beasts' blood.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Yes, all of them must be gutted. Do you accept?'' (Accept - I'll kill the beasts.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Good. Get it done soon.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.'' Kassandra left the huntress and slew the beasts as requested before returning to her. *'''Woman:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.'' *'''Woman:''' ''You've done me a great service, [[mercenary]]. Take this as thanks.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''All in a day's work.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the Huntress and was rewarded for this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
